item.title: Evening everybody. Anyone with a passing interest in the record label, please could you take the time to go to http://www.weregoingdeep.co.uk and sign up for the newsletter. The newsletter will contain updates, release information and monthly download codes for discounted digital files.
item.dc:creator: @placid303
item.description: Evening everybody. Anyone with a passing interest in the record label, please could you take the time to go to weregoingdeep.co.uk and sign up for the newsletter. The newsletter will contain updates, release information and monthly download codes for discounted digital files.

item.title: Afternoon. Quick heads up, I‚Äôm going to keep this account for gigs and placid related stuff. The Were Going Deep record label posts and info can be found on @weregoingdeep going forwards.
item.dc:creator: @placid303
item.description: Afternoon. Quick heads up, I‚Äôm going to keep this account for gigs and placid related stuff. The Were Going Deep record label posts and info can be found on @weregoingdeep going forwards.

item.title: RT by @placid303: Low Tape - WGD 12002 should be in your local record shops at the end of the week and the week after. I'll be putting some limited edition clear vinyl copies on the WGD bandcamp page.
item.dc:creator: @weregoingdeep
item.description: Low Tape - WGD 12002 should be in your local record shops at the end of the week and the week after. I'll be putting some limited edition clear vinyl copies on the WGD bandcamp page.
